e02642cc-dc27-4f01-b09f-f8804fcdf347: An invisible, mobile field surrounds you and prevents creatures' movement in a 40-foot radius. Any creature within or entering the field must attempt a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g}. If it fails, it becomes unable to move for the duration of the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} or until it leaves the area. Repelled creatures' {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}actions{/g} are not otherwise restricted. They can fight other creatures and can cast spells and {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} you with ranged weapons. If you move closer to an affected creature, nothing happens. The creature is not forced back. The creature is free to make {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attacks{/g} against you if you come within {g|Encyclopedia:Reach}reach{/g}.
708435ab-9bc0-4ca7-add3-70cf3a4cee27: Each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, including immediately upon casting the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, you can cause one creature to collapse in on itself, inflicting 10 points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g} negates). Choosing a new target for this spell is a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g}. You can target a particular creature only once with each casting of the spell. Implosion has no effect on creatures with no material body or on incorporeal creatures.
7f56ef0d-0ca6-4986-8dc0-0b0b008b7cba:
Imbuing you with negative energy, this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} allows you to paralyze a single living humanoid for the duration of the spell with a successful melee {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}.
A {g|ConditionParalyzed}paralyzed{/g} subject exudes a carrion stench that causes all living creatures (except you) in a 10-foot-radius spread to become {g|ConditionSickened}sickened{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude{/g} negates). A {g|SpellsNeutralizePoison}neutralize poison{/g} spell removes the effect from a sickened creature, and creatures immune to poison are unaffected by the stench. This is a poison effect.
958da3f8-2bb0-4eb2-a968-7a6145b51ab8: On the next {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}d20{/g} roll the target makes, it must roll twice and take the less favorable result. For every five {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g} you have, the target must roll twice on an additional d20 roll (to a maximum of five rolls at 20th level).
7058ba59-7105-4440-a70b-c841c826d435:
The entire area of the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} begins to crawl with worms, flies, and other parasites, continuously devouring all life and each other.
Creatures in the area of effect or those that enter the area must succeed at a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g} or take {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}4d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit point{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} and 1d4 damage to all {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g} and be affected by {g|BuffParasiteInfestation}parasite infestation{/g} for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to the remaining duration of living plague (a successful save reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}ability damage{/g} to 1 and protects from the infestation but does not reduce the hit point damage). Creatures that remain in the area must save again each round.
The entire area of effect is considered difficult terrain, and each creature moving through the area takes 1d8 + half your {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} hit point damage and 1 damage to a random ability score for each 5 feet of movement through the area.
f131f7a4-f6b2-4e11-abba-a180edac2589:
The target creature suffers all the hindrances and none of the benefits of your oracle's curse class feature. You still suffer all effects of your oracle's curse.
If you do not have the oracle's curse class feature, this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} has no effect.
36565169-c2cb-4204-bb81-c3d4d62b6599: This creature has fallen prey to innumerable parasites crawling inside its body, blood, and even mind. Each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, the creature must succeed at a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g} or take {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}4d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit point{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} and 1d4 damage to all {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g} (a successful save reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}ability damage{/g} to 1 but does not reduce the hit point damage). If the creature dies while affected by parasite infestation, a swarm of parasites erupts from its body, seeking to satiate its hunger and attacking all but other swarms created by the living plague {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} for 1 minute.
92a8e994-270d-43a0-977a-2b0204b4e64b: This creature is {g|ConditionParalyzed}paralyzed{/g} and exudes a carrion stench that causes all living creatures (except the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}'s caster) in a 10-foot-radius spread to become {g|ConditionSickened}sickened{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude{/g} negates). A {g|SpellsNeutralizePoison}neutralize poison{/g} spell removes the effect from a sickened creature, and creatures immune to poison are unaffected by the stench. This is a poison effect.
a08fa6ed-af9a-4adf-a943-ec3eeb3dce84: This creature takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit point{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} each turn. Bleeding can be stopped through the application of any effect that {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}cures{/g} hit point damage (even if the bleed is {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}ability damage{/g}).
3d8195d6-94b3-4c3f-8895-ad009fc9befb: This rune is activated by any creatures. Once triggered, a symbol of vulnerability remains active for 10 minutes per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} and saps the defenses of all creatures within 30 feet. Affected creatures receive a –4 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g} and a –4 penalty on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g} (if any) is reduced by 10 (to a minimum of 0), and any energy {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resistances{/g} they have are suppressed. The effects last as long as the creature is within the area of effect, and for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} per caster level afterward.
5641ee36-87b3-497d-bf95-272cfcde81d0: This rune is activated by any creatures. Once triggered, a symbol of weakness remains active for 10 minutes per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} and inflicts crippling weakness that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}3d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}damage{/g} to all creatures within 30 feet. A creature can only be affected by this symbol once per day.
d990b6ec-a65d-4729-abb8-3ce80ca74f39: When you cast meteor swarm, you call a rain of meteors down upon an area, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}8d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning damage{/g} and 24d6 points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} to every creature within it. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} halves this {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. Meteor swarm ignores {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g}.
2b9d2a35-2ccc-46e8-a3fe-e9e1afa78fde: You coat the target in necrotic fungus that makes its flesh soft and fragile. The target takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d3{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}damage{/g}. Any physical {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} against the target automatically adds 1d6 points of bleed {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. If the target dies while under the effect, all creatures within 15 feet of the target take 1d8 {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}negative energy damage{/g} per 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g} (maximum 10d8) and must succeed at a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} or themselves gain the effects of the original fungal infestation {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. This is a disease effect.
839c2dc5-276a-4ba7-b74e-c651990a6171:
You conjure a number of miniature comets of ice (up to one per four {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g}) to orbit around you, granting you a circumstance {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to the number of comets on all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against fire effects.
Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} when you are affected by a {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} cast by an enemy, you fire one of your comets in retaliation. This is a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning damage{/g} and 3d6 points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} + 1 point of cold damage per two caster levels (maximum +10). If the spell you're retaliating against had the fire {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Descriptor}descriptor{/g}, you fire one additional comet.
9f9df2b7-2476-4cfd-bead-f1ea4fc9ed2f: You open a portal to nothingness within yourself and let the hungering void consume everything. All enemies within 30 feet take {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} and gain 1d4 negative levels. Half of this damage is {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning{/g}, and the other half is negative energy. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g} reduces the damage by half and the number of negative levels gained to 1. Regardless of whether the saving throw is successful, all creatures are also subject to a pull attempt. The force has a {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} modifier equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier (whichever is highest). The {g|Encyclopedia:CMB}CMB{/g} for the force's pull uses your caster level as its {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g}, adding the force's Strength modifier. If the pull {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}maneuver{/g} is successful, the creature is subject to a trip maneuver attempt using the same rules.
